import React,{createContext,useContext,useReducer}from"react";// 초기 상태
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const initialState={projects:[],currentProject:null,prompts:[],loading:false,error:null};// 액션 타입
const ActionTypes={SET_LOADING:"SET_LOADING",SET_ERROR:"SET_ERROR",SET_PROJECTS:"SET_PROJECTS",SET_CURRENT_PROJECT:"SET_CURRENT_PROJECT",SET_PROMPTS:"SET_PROMPTS",ADD_PROJECT:"ADD_PROJECT",REMOVE_PROJECT:"REMOVE_PROJECT",ADD_PROMPT:"ADD_PROMPT",UPDATE_PROMPT:"UPDATE_PROMPT",REMOVE_PROMPT:"REMOVE_PROMPT"};// 리듀서
const appReducer=(state,action)=>{switch(action.type){case ActionTypes.SET_LOADING:return{...state,loading:action.payload};case ActionTypes.SET_ERROR:return{...state,error:action.payload,loading:false};case ActionTypes.SET_PROJECTS:return{...state,projects:action.payload,loading:false};case ActionTypes.SET_CURRENT_PROJECT:return{...state,currentProject:action.payload,loading:false};case ActionTypes.SET_PROMPTS:return{...state,prompts:action.payload,loading:false};case ActionTypes.ADD_PROJECT:return{...state,projects:[...state.projects,action.payload],loading:false};case ActionTypes.REMOVE_PROJECT:return{...state,projects:state.projects.filter(p=>p.id!==action.payload),loading:false};case ActionTypes.ADD_PROMPT:return{...state,prompts:[...state.prompts,action.payload],loading:false};case ActionTypes.UPDATE_PROMPT:return{...state,prompts:state.prompts.map(p=>p.id===action.payload.id?action.payload:p),loading:false};case ActionTypes.REMOVE_PROMPT:return{...state,prompts:state.prompts.filter(p=>p.id!==action.payload),loading:false};default:return state;}};// Context 생성
const AppContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();// Provider 컴포넌트
export const AppProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[state,dispatch]=useReducer(appReducer,initialState);const actions={setLoading:loading=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.SET_LOADING,payload:loading}),setError:error=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.SET_ERROR,payload:error}),setProjects:projects=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.SET_PROJECTS,payload:projects}),setCurrentProject:project=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.SET_CURRENT_PROJECT,payload:project}),setPrompts:prompts=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.SET_PROMPTS,payload:prompts}),addProject:project=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.ADD_PROJECT,payload:project}),removeProject:projectId=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.REMOVE_PROJECT,payload:projectId}),addPrompt:prompt=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.ADD_PROMPT,payload:prompt}),updatePrompt:prompt=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.UPDATE_PROMPT,payload:prompt}),removePrompt:promptId=>dispatch({type:ActionTypes.REMOVE_PROMPT,payload:promptId})};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContext.Provider,{value:{state,actions},children:children});};// Hook
export const useApp=()=>{const context=useContext(AppContext);if(!context){throw new Error("useApp must be used within an AppProvider");}return context;};
